name: TwitchPlays Minesweeper
description:
This is a version of minesweeper controlled by your twitch chat. Menus are set up by the streamer, and once the game is started, the chat can play through, fail, and restart all on their own, including changing difficulties. 

There are 3 different modes that change how the flags work:

-Smart Flags will only let you place flags on confirmable mines.

-Auto Flags will place flags automatically as you play.

-Free Flags is the classic place flags where you want mode.
